Name: Mount Barker Community Library, Local History Collection

About.Hours & facilities: General assistance available: Mon 9am-6pm, Tues, Wed, Thurs 9am-8pm, Fri 10am-5pm, Sat 9am-4pm. Local History Technician in attendance: Tues, Wed 9am-3pm, Thurs 9am-5pm.

About.Access: Individuals do own research or research carried out by Technician for a fee of $10 per half hour.

About.Acquisition focus: To acquire material related to local history within the Mount Barker district boundaries. Genealogical research tools pertaining to district and some State reference materials.

About.Major holdings: Courier Newspapers 1880-1950 on microfilm, 1962 onwards in hard copy.
